short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share google backdrops with your friends or enemies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to connect with friends near and far. Upload a photo from your computer to set it as your Google Chrome background and automatically update your friends backgrounds at the same time! Join multiple, password protected groups and connect with anyone using Google Chrome in this easy-to-use Chrome Extension, bringing buddies to your backdrops.


Enter into the app intro page by opening a new tab. Then make a new group or join an existing group. That's it! When you upload your photo the app with automatically assign it to your Chrome background as well as everyone in your group. Easily switch groups, view members of your group, access Google search and check the time in the top bar while enjoying a personalized Chrome background meant to share memories, kind messages and other backdrops made by you and meant to be shared with your brogeys.

The app also reformats the home screen to be more user friendly with a clock and ability to share captions for your background. You can now use Google Chrome to communicate, not only through your shared backgrounds, but also captions.

Tell your brogeys we say hi!
